attributes.additional_details: Quite simply because we’ve not been able to enjoy a Bank Holiday since New Years Day 2020.
attributes.background: The Government should make 21s June 2021 a special bank holiday so that the general public can enjoy our Independence Day in style at the local pub.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
